tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
As my daughter praised about her. Earlier l had got done the same job from Dentist in CGHS Dispensary no. 16 and Charak Palika Hospital.  I felt there, they people do their job not following the noble norms I think due to beaurocrcy part of nature involved and as far as Gandhi Clinic is concerned, they, I feel, get able to follow the human touch to save the future  carrier to get it bright.  In my view the doctor take little higher fee & charges but committed to their promise which they have done to the patient.  Although, in this developing country, all are constrained, inspite of that who has maintained its personality, has the right to rise and reach the peak of progress.

Keep it up

I hope from the clinic will shine like a star, in the way of keeping alive flame of huminity,the name  it has Gandhi, memorise the name of 'Bapu' father of nation.

Good luck to you

Tarsem Lal Ralhan
D- 177, Moti Bagh-I

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Kamal came across as a very seasoned doctor with a very realistic approach to the problem that we wanted to be addressed.
Her friendly nature and the usage of layman's language to explain the whole process of the treatment made it that much easier for us to relate to her.
Keep up the good work and as a educationist I would also suggest that you must talk to kids of various schools and colleges regarding the need and importance of good oral care more so with the very food habits amongst the youth.
Rgds

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: From everything starting with identifying the issue, to the explanation, ongoings during the procedure, next steps, after care, to the entire procedure itself- couldn't recommend a better or more expert dentist. Comfort level and pain thresholds were very important to the doctor which I truly appreciated. Also took the time to get to know me to ensure I was comfortable before starting with the procedure (and during). The entire process was completely stress free and it was over before I knew it. The staff works as a team and the entire experience was quite remarkable. 10 on 10 for quality, expertise, friendliness, hygiene, satisfaction and referability. Thank you Dr. Gandhi.
reply_text: Thank you Nelson for your kind feedback.

review: Being my first attempt for a tooth implant I was a bit apprehensive about its success. However having undergone the whole process lasting six months at Gandhi's Dental  Care I am extremely satisfied with the result and enjoying benefits of healthy teeth. The doctor and the staff were always encouraging, professional, efficient and effective. Thanks and best wishes

review:
The dentist is very sweet,nice and understanding.I had gone for cavity filling and scaling of my teeth and it was made an easy process by her and I got my teeth fixed in 3-4 visits.
She understands you and all your problems in one go then guide you accordingly.I recommended to my family members as well and even my husband and my daughter got there teeth related problem fixed by her.She is now like a family and I would recommend people to not hide there any problem from dentist as they are right and then can fix your problem at right time.Now whenever I feel I am facing any problem related to teeth I directly go to her.They have a very good mechanism where they scan your teeth and also the problematic area so when you visit the next time the dentist can directly work on it and the customer doesn't have to remember where exactly they are facing problem which is very helpful ,time saving and advance technology.
